enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Parties discussed the possible scope of the planned workshop, including issues relating to definitions, drivers of deforestation, methodological and scientific issues, and positive incentives.
PAPUA NEW GUINEA and others emphasized incentives, while the EU and others stressed methodological issues.
BRAZIL noted the need to distinguish between trading and non-trading approaches.
Co-chairs Rosland and Carlino will present a proposal on Friday.
